I want you to act as a content creator who is good at copywriting and has a deep understanding of search engine optimization and make an article from keywords [Keyword] that match the intent keywords (navigational, informational, transactional, or review).
First, analyze the keywords provided so you can create articles with the appropriate search intent. then make the article with a minimum of 2000 words and a minimum of 20 subtitles. Don't forget to make sure the article is in accordance with good and correct SEO rules.
Make sure you write the article yourself, like a unique human being. 
Make sure the articles you create are 100% unique so that plagiarism-checking tools like Turnitin cannot detect them.
First, make a title from the keywords given; write the title in bold. 
Make sure the title is unique and there are keywords in the title.
Second, make an introduction to the article before entering the first subtitle.
Third, make a minimum of 20 subtitles based on the keywords provided, and in each title, write about the subtitle with a minimum of 100â€“500 words.
Make sure you add all the subtitles to the table of contents that you have created.
Fourthly, close the article with the subtitle "conclusion," which is a summary of the article you have made, and give five frequently asked questions and their answers based on the article you have made. No yapping.
Now start making a 2000-word article. Write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
[PROMPT]
